sourcesContent: import { testimonialImages } from '../../Interfaces/content'; import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-testimonial-images', templateUrl: './testimonial-images.component.html', styleUrls: ['./testimonial-images.component.css'] }) export class TestimonialImagesComponent { @Input() images: testimonialImages = { type: 'testimonialImages', imgURL1: '', imgURL2: '', imgURL3: '', imgURL4: '', imgURL5: '', imgURL6: '', } }
